greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerators of rational valued sequence whose Dirichlet convolution with itself yields A078899 (the ordinal transform of A006530, the largest prime factor of n).
comment: The first negative term is a(216) = -97.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
formula: a(n) = numerator of f(n), where f(1) = 1, f(n) = (1/2) * (A078899(n) - Sum_{d|n, d>1, d<n} f(d) * f(n/d)) for n > 1.
program: ordinal_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), pt); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), pt = mapget(om, invec[i]), pt = 0); outvec[i] = (1+pt); mapput(om,invec[i],(1+pt))); outvec; };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 12 2018
